attributes.action: Force the Conservative Party to remove Boris Johnson as Leader
attributes.additional_details: To prevent further damage to the UK and it’s citizens
attributes.background: Remove Boris Johnson as Prime Minister, in light of his appalling lack of appropriate action regarding Covid-19

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Minister to lose their job.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
